SELECT e.*, et.TypeName, l.LaboratoryName FROM equipment e LEFT JOIN equipmenttype et ON e.TypeId = et.TypeId LEFT JOIN laboratory l ON e.LaboratoryId = l.LaboratoryId
AND e.EquipmentName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{equipmentName}, '%')
AND l.LaboratoryName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{laboratoryName}, '%')
AND et.TypeName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{typeName}, '%')
ORDER BY e.EquipmentId asc LIMIT #{currentPage}, #{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM equipment e LEFT JOIN equipmenttype et ON e.TypeId = et.TypeId LEFT JOIN laboratory l ON e.LaboratoryId = l.LaboratoryId
AND e.EquipmentName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{equipmentName}, '%')
AND l.LaboratoryName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{laboratoryName}, '%')
AND et.TypeName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{typeName}, '%')
